channel.title: Error help please?
channel.description: Could someone tell me why I get this error? This happens a lot. It repeats itself over and over again, and then stops. [code=Java] Error with player 1, 0wn3 java.lang.NullPointerException at client.sendQuest(client.java:6909) at client.Quest_Tab(client.java:1244) at client.process(client.java:25069) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:289) at process.run(process.java:14) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code] Quest_Tab [code=Java]sendQuest("@or1@Players online: @gre@"+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+" !", 7332);[/code] Process[code=Java]Quest_Tab();[/code] I changed the sendquest to sendFrame126 to see if it will help, I'll check it when I get home from school today.

item.title: Error help please?
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

Okay, what about this? Only 4 hays clicked button: 9154 Exception encountered while parsing incoming packets from Only 4 hays. java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: recv failed at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at client.packetProcess(client.java:26041) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:290) at process.run(process.java:14) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) ClientHandler: Client Only 4 hays disconnected (195.240.13.183) Connection from 195.240.13.183:1804 Exception in thread "Thread-331" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at java.io.BufferedReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.BufferedReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.checkLog(client.java:11472) at client.run(client.java:26668) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [Player-1-0wn3]: Following started! Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at java.io.BufferedReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.BufferedReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at server.checkLog(server.java:230) at server.checkHost(server.java:220) at server.run(server.java:288) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)The line 26668 is tempbans [code=Java] if (checkLog(“ipbans”, host)) {
System.out.println(“They are in ip ban list!”);
return false; // ip ban added by bakatool
}
return true;
}

public boolean checkLog(String file, String playerName) {
	// check ipbans -bakatool
	try {
		BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("config//"
				+ file + ".txt"));
		String data = null;
		while ((data = in.readLine()) != null) {
			if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(data)) {
				return true;
			}
		}
	} catch (IOException e) {
		System.out.println("Critical error while checking for data!");
		System.out.println(file + ":" + playerName);
		e.printStackTrace();
	}
	return false;
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Error help please?
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

Some object you are referencing is null. Perhaps the playerCount has not been set or it is trying to process an instance of Player that has been destructed but not removed from the processing list.

Read full topic

item.title: Error help please?
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

Could someone tell me why I get this error? This happens a lot. It repeats itself over and over again, and then stops.

I changed the sendquest to sendFrame126 to see if it will help, I’ll check it when I get home from school today.
